name: Document Library Property Set File
summary: Learn about .SET files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Properties contain descriptive information about documents. When a Library Search is performed, documents can be selected based on their properties, which makes finding documents easier. This helps make large databases of documents more manageable.

SET files are created by the Library Administration Tool, which is part of Xerox FreeFlow Software package. To create a new Property Set, click the "Cabinets and Properties" tab, then select "New Property Set" from the toolbar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
